Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui.page

Class HomePage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui.page.Page
it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui.page.HomePage
public class HomePage extends Page
The HomePage class represents the home page of the TUI. It extends the Page class and provides methods to display the home page.
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi
See Also:

  • TUI

  • Constructor Details

    • HomePage

      public HomePage(TUI tui)
      Constructs a new HomePage object with the given TUI (Text User Interface). Initializes the output stream by obtaining it from the TUI.
      Parameters:
      tui - the TUI object

  • Method Details

    • show

      public void show()
      Displays the home page in the TUI. Shows the game state, players' information, points, common goals, board, bookshelf, personal goal, current player and unread messages.
      Specified by:
      show in class Page
      See Also:
      • ViewData
      • Page.show()

    • onCurrentPlayerChanged

      public void onCurrentPlayerChanged()
      Overrides the Page.onCurrentPlayerChanged() method from the parent class. This method is called when the current player changes. It calls the show() method to display the updated home page.
      Overrides:
      onCurrentPlayerChanged in class Page
      See Also:
      • Page.onCurrentPlayerChanged()

    • printBoardBookShelfPersonalGoal

      private void printBoardBookShelfPersonalGoal(char[][] board, char[][] bookshelf, char[][] personalGoal)
      Prints the board, bookshelf and personal goal of the player.
      Parameters:
      board - the matrix representing the board
      bookshelf - the matrix representing the player's bookshelf
      personalGoal - the matrix representing the player's personal goal
      See Also:
      • ViewData

    • getDividerPersonalGoal

      private String getDividerPersonalGoal(int row)
      Returns a divider line for the personal goal based on the specified row.
      Parameters:
      row - The row number for which the divider line is generated.
      Returns:
      The divider line as a formatted string.

    • printLineBoard

      private void printLineBoard(int r, char[][] board)
      Prints a single line of the board based on the specified row and the board matrix.
      Parameters:
      r - The row number to be printed.
      board - The char matrix representing the board.

    • printLinePersonalGoal

      private void printLinePersonalGoal(int row, char[][] matrix)
      Prints a single line of the personal goal based on the specified row and the matrix representing the personal goal.
      Parameters:
      row - The row number to be printed.
      matrix - The char matrix representing the personal goal matrix.
